title: Can Car-free Living Make You Happier?
excerpt: The community of Culdesac, Arizona, was designed for pedestrians and cyclists. And residents love it.

title: The quest to depave the world's cities
excerpt: From Australia to Ontario, cities are taking up unnecessary stretches of concrete and asphalt, allowing nature to take hold in their place.

title: ‘We’re going to get messy’: Inside the ‘Depave’ movement that’s swapping as
excerpt: “We've had a love affair with paving things for several generations." The Depave movement is trying to change that.
